imageDescriptions.name: CHALLENGE-10
imageDescriptions.description: White bear sitting on hind legs with right front paw raised as if waving, while the other is resting close to the heart, it is a cold place and the ground is covered with snow.

imageDescriptions.name: CHALLENGE-7
imageDescriptions.description: Fox with mostly red fur, with a white chest area, with black fur on the ears and paws, facing the viewer, looking back, with snow-capped mountains in the background

imageDescriptions.name: CHALLENGE-6
imageDescriptions.description: Small lizard with green scales, facing the viewer, with half-closed eyes standing on top of a piece of wood, with the background blurred

imageDescriptions.name: CHALLENGE-5
imageDescriptions.description: Squirrel standing sideways, hunched over, eating a nut on a piece of wood, green background

imageDescriptions.name: CHALLENGE-9
imageDescriptions.description: Male deer facing the viewer with dark brown fur, over a dark green plain with fog in the background

imageDescriptions.name: CHALLENGE-8
imageDescriptions.description: A blue bird with a small round belly and red tail feathers, facing the viewer, on top of a rock, background blurred.
